page.title: 03WEEKDAYS/WEEKENDS WICKERSLEY
page.content: { { { { { home for dinners.I have fishfingers chips and peas.Some people have school dinners and some people have packed lunch.We finish school at 3.45.I run home and get ready to go riding.I ride and groom my pony Gypsy.I come back at 6.00.I have my tea and then play for a while.When I am in bed I sometimes read for half an hour depending on the time.On Saturday I go to Rotherham with my mum to do the shopping.We spend nearly all day in town.At 12.00 we go to a cafe for lunch.We go to lots of shops.We get back at about 3.00.The time that we arrive in town is about 10.30.On Sunday I get up at 7.00 because I go riding.First of all
